english.segment1: I'm a Warrior. I'm a Warrior. I would die for you. For you. My love is fierce. I'm a Warrior. I would die for you. For you
english.segment3: I'm a Warrior. With a Warrior's heart. And it burns for you. For you. My love is fierce. I'm a Warrior. I would die for you. Give it all for you
english.segment5: I wont give up. I wont give up. On you. I wont give up. On you. I will sign your name. Until my heart caves in. Until my heart caves in
english.segment6: I wont give up. I wont give up. I wont give up. I wont give up. I will sign your name. Until my heart caves in. Until my heart caves in
english.segment7: I'm a warrior. I'm a warrior. I will sign your name. Until my heart caves in. Until my heart caves in
